title: Siegel Rewards Program, Fully furnished apartments, Bad Credit OK
posting_body: ['Paradise Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Bad Credit OK', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Easy freeway access', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Large studio and one bedroom apartments', '-Free premium cable TV', '-No long term lease required', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Unfurnished apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
